# w-icon

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                 | Type                                                            | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `borderRadius`   | `border-radius`    | border style of the icon wrapper                            | `"circle" \| "rounded" \| "square"`                             | `'rounded'` |
| `design`         | `design`           | select the design of the icon wrapper                       | `"error" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
| `flat`           | `flat`             | if true hide the border and background color of the wrapper | `boolean`                                                       | `false`     |
| `outline`        | `outline`          | if true hide the background color of the wrapper            | `boolean`                                                       | `false`     |
| `udpateSvgColor` | `udpate-svg-color` | if true, svg color matches color with design                | `boolean`                                                       | `true`      |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description    |
| ----------- | -------------- |
| `"default"` | eg. svg or img |
